title: Restoring this enzyme's function protects against heart disease in lupus and beyond

title_detail.value: Restoring this enzyme's function protects against heart disease in lupus and beyond

summary: Patients with lupus are at increased risk of heart disease. Exposing endothelial cells -- known to protect against heart disease, in part by producing nitric oxide -- to the serum of patients with lupus decreased nitric oxide production. Administering L-sepiapterin restored that production.
